name: Regression (Hamzah's Game Dev)
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is my first ever Unity game group project made for my Game Design & Development Studio 1 called "Regression".  It is an 2D Action-Adventure Fantasy game platformer, developed for  PC platform.

Game Made By: 

Haoting(Lead, Programmer), Hamzah(Me, Programmer) & Russell Teo(Artist)

Character Art & Animation, Enemies Animation by Haoting

Enemies & Environment Art by Russell Teo

Game's Story Description:

You will be playing as Flair, a former retired warrior that fights for the king in disguise of working as a maid in the town village till she was once needed again when a corruption erupted in the kingdom castle of Aerano and devasted the entire continent civilization of surrounding 20 kilometers around where the explosion happened. Now it’s up to flair grab back onto her shining armor and sword to find out what’s happening and into unravelling the truth.   

Controls:

To Move: A  & D Key

To Attack: L Key

To Parry: K Key

Jump: Spacebar

Pause Menu: Esc
